name: 骑士派对
description:
I will default all card types to everyone in the game (including all different professions, magic trap cards. I will also add new types in the future), as well as card packs dropped twice a week. These should be enough for everyone to play.



As I am completely unfamiliar with numerical values, please play them as casual games. We will weaken or enhance based on everyone's collective opinions. Please understand.



Each knight possesses four attributes: profession, skill, talent, and bond. Hero cards (such as SR and SSR) have fixed talents and bonds , and professions and skills are random . The professions, skills, talents, and bonds of other knights are all random , so when drawing, other knights may encounter extremely unfavorable situations. (These random parts will be fixed when extracted)



]There are currently a total of 54 talents (9 additional talents will appear during the adventure in the knight's self riding mode), 87 skills, 20 professions, and 16 bonds.



I will try my best to utilize the attributes on the card to their fullest potential in each game mode



Each card is not unique, so rest assured.
